revised_title: Mammoth Bones and the Universal Deluge: A Scientific Inquiry
tldr: The author examines the mammoth bones found in Siberia and argues that they belonged to elephants. He also discusses the possibility of the bones being remnants of the universal deluge mentioned in the Bible. The author provides evidence from various sources and compares the mammoth bones to those found in other countries, such as Poland, Germany, Italy, England, and Ireland.
